Package com.qualcomm.hardware.broadcom

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BroadcomColorSensor
    BroadcomColorSensor is an extension of ColorSensor that provides additional functionality supported by a family of color sensor chips from Broadcom.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BroadcomColorSensor.Parameters
    Instances of Parameters contain data indicating how the sensor is to be initialized.
    BroadcomColorSensorImpl
    BroadcomColorSensorImpl is used to support the Rev Robotics V3 color sensor
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BroadcomColorSensor.Gain  
    BroadcomColorSensor.LEDCurrent  
    BroadcomColorSensor.LEDPulseModulation  
    BroadcomColorSensor.LSMeasurementRate  
    BroadcomColorSensor.LSResolution  
    BroadcomColorSensor.MainControl  
    BroadcomColorSensor.MainStatus  
    BroadcomColorSensor.PSMeasurementRate  
    BroadcomColorSensor.PSResolution  
    BroadcomColorSensor.Register
    BroadcomColorSensor.Register provides symbolic names for interesting device registers
